abstract: Lone Star Funds has submitted documents requested by South Korean authorities that could help the private equity house avoid sanctions including the forced sale of its shares in Korea Exchange Bank, already offered to HSBC.
lead_paragraph: Lone Star Funds has submitted documents requested by South Korean authorities that could help the private equity house avoid sanctions including the forced sale of its shares in Korea Exchange Bank, already offered to HSBC.

headline.main: Lone Star Seeks to Avoid Seoul Sanctions
